refs_comments: The only book-length grammar of Ghanaian Pidgin English is the slim volume by Amoako (2011), which is based on his 1992 PhD thesis. Interested readers are also advised to consult Chapter 6 in Huber (1999a), as well as Dako 2003.
title: Ghanaian Pidgin English
